required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation of Lithium Disilicate (e.Max) and Hybrid Nano-ceramic (Grandio) CAD/CAM Endocrowns
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Evaluation of Lithium Disilicate (e.Max) and Hybrid Nano-ceramic (Grandio) CAD/CAM Endocrowns (Randomized Control Clinical Trial)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare marginal adaptation, fracture, retention, shade matching and patient satisfaction between lithium disilicate (e.max) and hybrid nano-ceramic (Grandio) CAD/CAM endocrowns.

primary_outcome.description: Using Binary Visual Analogue scale (Satisfied/ not satisfied)

secondary_outcome.description: Using the modified United States Public Health Service criteria (Modified USPHS)- categorical

arm_group.description: The intervention will be: Prosthetic endocrown
The intervention will be: Prosthetic endocrown

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with good oral hygiene
- Patients having one or more endodontically treated molars that need prosthetic restoration.
- Molars should have enough tooth structure for endocrown restoration with minimum 3 walls with thickness not less than 1.5 mm and gingival step placed supragingival
- Fully erupted molars
- Molars free of developmental defect
- Healthy periodontium
- Absence of periapical pathosis
- Acceptable endodontic treatment and proper bone support
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with bad oral hygiene
- Patients with active periodontal disease
- Patients with missing teeth opposing to the area intended for restoration
- Patients with parafunctional habits or psychiatric problems or unrealistic expectation.
